name: Product Demo
description: 30-90 second product showcase video. Problem-solution structure with close-up product shots and real-world usage scenarios. Works for e-commerce, SaaS, and physical products.

config.style_notes: Clean backgrounds, premium lighting, product always in focus. Mix close-ups with lifestyle context shots.

config.notes: If user provides product photos, use them as references for consistency. Generate additional angles and contexts.
Product shots need subtle, elegant motion — slow rotation, gentle zoom, smooth reveal. Avoid chaotic movement.

config.sfx_notes: Subtle whoosh on transitions, soft impact on product reveal

config.variant_notes: Generate 16:9 master + 9:16 vertical crop + 1:1 square crop

structure.purpose: Show the pain point. Relatable frustration.
Introduce product as the answer. Hero shot.
Clear next step: buy, try, learn more.

example_prompts: Use the "Product Demo" template for my wireless earbuds: noise-canceling, 40h battery, $79. Here are 3 product photos.
Make a product demo video for our SaaS dashboard — it helps teams track OKRs in real-time.
Product Demo template: showcase this smart water bottle that tracks hydration and syncs with Apple Health.
tips: Always use the customer's actual product images as reference — AI-generated product shots look generic
Lead with the problem, not the product — viewers need to feel the pain before they care about the solution
Show the product in use, not just sitting there — motion and context sell better than hero shots alone
Keep feature count to 3 max — more than 3 features in 90s overwhelms viewers
End card should have clear, single CTA — don't give 5 options
